snippet: The Federal Communications Commission approved on Thursday a proposal to let consumers swap their cable television boxes for cheaper devices and apps.
abstract: Federal Communications Commission agrees to proposal that will allow consumers to switch their cable TV boxes for less expensive devices and apps.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Communications Commission approved on Thursday a proposal to let consumers swap their cable television boxes for cheaper devices and apps.

headline.print_headline: F.C.C. Approves Swapping Cable Box for Cheaper Devices
headline.main: F.C.C. Approves Swapping Cable Box for Cheaper Devices
